description: InMemoryNoteDao.kt defines an in-memory implementation of the NoteDao interface for managing Note objects within an Android application. It provides methods for CRUD operations, live data updates, and filtering notes by category. This class is used as a fallback when the Room database cannot be initialized.

classes.name: InMemoryNoteDao
classes.description: An in-memory implementation of NoteDao for ephemeral storage of notes during app runtime.

methods.name: getByCategory
methods.description: Filters notes by a specified category and observes for changes.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Suspending function to retrieve a note by its ID.

methods.name: insert
methods.description: Inserts a new note, assigns an ID if needed, and returns the note's ID.

methods.name: deleteById
methods.description: Deletes a note by its ID.

methods.name: publish
methods.description: Posts updated list of notes to the live data object.
